p: The in silico studies reported herein were obtained using the PubMed, Scopus, and Google Scholar databases. The keywords “in silico” or “docking” were paired with “SARS-CoV-2” or “COVID-19” to obtain articles published as of 4 July 2020. No language restriction was imposed. Some of the most relevant articles regarding food components were selected manually to give an overview of the current in silico studies on COVID-19 related to food. The selected articles are shown in Table 2.
